column2: SELECT p.ra, p.dec, z.z, z.zErr, p.petroMag_r FROM PhotoObj p JOIN dbo.fGetNearbyObjEq (#, #, #) n ON n.objID = p.objID JOIN Photoz z ON z.objID = n.objID WHERE p.type = # AND z.z < # + #*z.zErr AND z.z > # - #*z.zErr AND z.zErr < # */ --DECLARE @cnt INT = #; --WHILE @cnt < = # --BEGIN SELECT p.ra, p.dec, z.z, z.zErr, p.petroMag_r FROM PhotoObj p JOIN dbo.fGetNearbyObjEq (mydb.sample_targets4.ra, mydb.sample_targets4.dec, mydb.sample_targets4.theta) n ON n.objID = p.objID JOIN Photoz z ON z.objID = n.objID WHERE p.type = # AND z.z < mydb.sample_targets4.z + #*z.zErr AND z.z > mydb.sample_targets4.z - #*z.zErr AND z.zErr < # -- SET @cnt = @cnt + #; --END;
